body.p: Not as valuable as card account data, but names, contact information and addresses would still be a target for attackers.

ol.li: Breach of network through employee workstations (malware, phishing)
Breach of network through network attack (unpatched vulnerability, security misconfiguration)
Breach of network through Shop application (data disclosure bug, code vulnerability leading to compromise)
EndPoint security programs, network separation, education, least privilege principle
Rigorous patch policy, frequent scanning and remediation, logging and monitoring
Application functionality (sensitive data is encrypted), testing, frequent framework patching
Principle of least privilege, low turnover
